FILE: cm630750v11.0.txt
DYAD: IRAN - INDIA
RIVALRY: RIV1203
DISPUTE(S): MID3035 MID2792 

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190220
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190220

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID3035

TERRMID: MID3035 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID3035 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3035 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID3035 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID3035 from Gibler 2018, in 1984 Iran attacked an Indian oil tanker during the Iran-Iraq War. Iran routinely attacked ships trading with Iraq to harm Iraq's economy during the war. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID3035 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3035 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3035 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3035 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3035 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3035 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID3035 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3035 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3035 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3035 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3035 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3035 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID2792

TERRMID: MID2792 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2792 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2792 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2792 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2792 from Gibler 2018, in 1987 Iran attacked two Indian oil tankers during the Iran-Iraq War. Iran routinely attacked ships trading with Iraq to harm Iraq's economy during the war. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID2792 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2792 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2792 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2792 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2792 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2792 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2792 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2792 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2792 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2792 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2792 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2792 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:
